examples.example: 那栋崭新的教学楼里传出阵阵朗朗的读书声。

translate.english: The brand-new teaching building emits bursts of loud reading sounds.

examples.example: 那栋宏伟的教学楼静静地矗立在校园中，承载着无数学子的梦想。

translate.english: That magnificent teaching building stands quietly on the campus, carrying the dreams of countless students.

examples.example: 那座宽敞明亮的教学楼见证了一届又一届学生的成长与进步。

translate.english: That spacious and bright teaching building has witnessed the growth and progress of generations of students.
